newsitem.title: USA: American Medserve invests in pharmacy.
newsitem.headline: American Medserve invests in pharmacy.

text.p: American Medserve Corp said Tuesday it had invested an undisclosed amount in HMIS Inc, an institutional pharmacy in Timonium, Md.
HMIS provides pharmacy and related services to about 2,500 residents in long-term care facilities in Maryland, American Medserve said. HMIS has annual revenues of about $10 million.
American Medserve provides pharmacy services to about 45,500 residents of more than 600 long-term care facilities and assisted living sites in 10 states.
American Medserve shares were down 1/2 at 18.
